title: Roborock's Prime Day Launch: New Q & Qrevo Models Offer Smart Cleaning at Unbeatable Prices
description: This article is sponsored by Roborock.
author: Sponsored
excerpt: This article is sponsored by Roborock.
text: This article is sponsored by Roborock. Product choices and opinions expressed are from the sponsor and do not reflect the views of MakeUseOf editorial staff. Roborock, a leader in smart home cleaning, is back with a major refresh to its lineup just in time for Prime Day. Following the release of its latest flagship robot vacuum with a robotic arm, the brand is now launching four new models across its Q and Qrevo Series, this time with a strong focus on affordability. Whether you're dealing with pet hair or simply want a low-maintenance robot helper to handle daily messes without breaking the bank, Roborock’s new lineup offers plenty of smart and budget-friendly options. Even better, these new releases will be part of Roborock’s Prime Day deals, giving you powerful, smart cleaning at affordable prices. The Q Series: Smart Cleaning, Smarter Price Roborock is expanding its most budget-friendly lineup with two new options: the Q7 M5+ and Q10 S5+. The Q7 M5+ brings mopping functionality to those with tighter budgets, while the Q10 S5+ bundles advanced features like object avoidance, vibrating mop pads, and carpet detection at a much lower price point. Both models come equipped with a self-emptying dock, smart LiDAR navigation, multi-room mapping, and an anti-tangle brush design, making them an excellent choice for pet owners. If you're in the market for a budget-friendly robot vacuum, here is how the two models stack up: Roborock Q7 M5+: The Smart Entry-Level Choice​​​​ Roborock Q7 M5+ If you're dipping your toes into robot vacuums, the Roborock Q7 M5+ is the perfect option for you. It offers intelligent cleaning at a more affordable price, with features like precise LiDAR navigation that ensures every corner is mapped efficiently, 10,000Pa suction for deep cleaning, and a dual anti-tangle system that effortlessly handles pet hair and debris. Most importantly, it adds mopping functionality, which is an excellent upgrade over the Q5 Max+. While it's a simple, fixed mop, it's still a great choice if you want a combo vacuum/mopping robot at a more affordable price point. The Q7 M5+ also comes with a self-emptying dock that keeps the robot as low-maintenance as possible. Unlike cheaper robot vacuums that need frequent emptying, the Q7 M5+ can clean unattended for up to 7 weeks so you can focus on what matters while still coming back to a clean and allergen-free home. Roborock Q10 S5+: Upgraded Performance for Demanding Homes Roborock Q10 S5+ A step up from the Q7 M5+, this cost-effective model adds Reactive Tech obstacle avoidance and the VibraRise 2.0 Mopping System while keeping the same strong suction and anti-tangle technology. It not only navigates your home with precision but also avoids objects in its cleaning path, so you don't have to tidy up as much before it cleans. One standout feature of the Roborock Q10 S5+ is its VibraRise 2.0 Mopping System, which scrubs your floors 3,000 times per minute to tackle stubborn stains like dried coffee spills. It also automatically lifts the mop pad 8mm when it detects carpets, meaning you don't have to manually remove the pad if you have both hardwood and carpeted floors. Like the Q7 M5+, the Q10 S5+ also comes with an auto-emptying dock that automatically cleans its dustbin when docked. It also has a bigger battery for extended cleaning rounds and can keep detailed maps for up to four floors, making it ideal for large and busy households that need thorough, hands-off cleaning. Qrevo Series: Premium Features, Mid-Range Price The Roborock Qrevo series hits the sweet spot between price and features for those seeking a truly hands-off floor-cleaning experience. Perfect for busy households, these models come with an all-in-one dock that auto-empties the dustbin, washes and dries the mop pads, and refills the water tank, offering a true set-and-forget smart cleaning solution. In this new lineup, Roborock is introducing two models: the Qrevo S5V, featuring powerful 12,000Pa suction and warm air drying and offering superior functionality, and the QV 35A, which brings automated mopping and vacuuming for under $400 this Prime Day, perfect for those looking for an entry-level robot. Roborock QV 35A: All-in-One Cleaning Under $400 Roborock QV 35A For budget-conscious buyers who still want a low-maintenance robot vacuum and mop, the Roborock QV 35A delivers full functionality for under $400 this Prime Day. It features 8,000Pa HyperForce suction that effectively lifts dust, debris, and pet hair from hardwood floors and low-pile carpets, but the real surprise is the premium features packed into this affordable package. The QV 35A includes a multifunctional dock that auto-empties the dustbin, washes and dries mop pads, and refills the water tank. While it lacks the warm air drying of the Qrevo S5V, that isn't a dealbreaker considering the price. Like other models in the Qrevo series, the QV 35A features smart navigation with object avoidance and multi-room mapping. It also comes with anti-tangle brushes and dual-spinning mops that lift 10mm over carpets, so you can schedule it to vacuum and mop without worrying about damp carpets or missed spots when you get home. Roborock Qrevo S5V: Best-in-Class Value Roborock Qrevo S5V The most value-packed option in the Qrevo lineup, the Roborock Qrevo S5V features impressive 12,000Pa suction that easily lifts dirt and pet hair embedded deep in crevices and carpets, plus a new FlexiArm edge mopping system that reaches into corners with ease. Combined with its highly effective anti-tangle brushes, the Qrevo S5V is an excellent choice for busy pet owners. The Qrevo S5V comes equipped with dual spinning pads that lift 10mm over carpets to avoid wetting them. It can even extend the mop pads to scrub hard-to-reach edges and corners, leaving your floors spotless with every run. While the powerful vacuum and mopping already set the Qrevo S5V apart from the competition, the included multifunctional dock takes it to another level. In addition to automatically emptying the dustbin, the all-in-one dock also washes the mop pads, dries them with warm air, and refills the water tanks for the next cleaning cycle. That’s about as low-maintenance as a robot vacuum gets, especially at this price point. Save Big on Roborock Robot Vacuums This Prime Day This Prime Day, Roborock will be running huge sales on its new robot vacuums and mops starting from July 7, 2025. All four models will be on sale with heavy discounts of up to $800 at Amazon and Target, making this the best time to replace your traditional vacuum with a smart and fully automated cleaning solution.
html:
This article is sponsored by Roborock. Product choices and opinions expressed are from the sponsor and do not reflect the views of MakeUseOf editorial staff.

Roborock, a leader in smart home cleaning, is back with a major refresh to its lineup just in time for Prime Day. Following the release of its latest flagship robot vacuum with a robotic arm, the brand is now launching four new models across its Q and Qrevo Series, this time with a strong focus on affordability.

Whether you're dealing with pet hair or simply want a low-maintenance robot helper to handle daily messes without breaking the bank, Roborock’s new lineup offers plenty of smart and budget-friendly options. Even better, these new releases will be part of Roborock’s Prime Day deals, giving you powerful, smart cleaning at affordable prices.

The Q Series: Smart Cleaning, Smarter Price

Roborock is expanding its most budget-friendly lineup with two new options: the Q7 M5+ and Q10 S5+. The Q7 M5+ brings mopping functionality to those with tighter budgets, while the Q10 S5+ bundles advanced features like object avoidance, vibrating mop pads, and carpet detection at a much lower price point.

Both models come equipped with a self-emptying dock, smart LiDAR navigation, multi-room mapping, and an anti-tangle brush design, making them an excellent choice for pet owners. If you're in the market for a budget-friendly robot vacuum, here is how the two models stack up:

Roborock Q7 M5+: The Smart Entry-Level Choice​​​​

Roborock Q7 M5+

If you're dipping your toes into robot vacuums, the Roborock Q7 M5+ is the perfect option for you. It offers intelligent cleaning at a more affordable price, with features like precise LiDAR navigation that ensures every corner is mapped efficiently, 10,000Pa suction for deep cleaning, and a dual anti-tangle system that effortlessly handles pet hair and debris.

Most importantly, it adds mopping functionality, which is an excellent upgrade over the Q5 Max+. While it's a simple, fixed mop, it's still a great choice if you want a combo vacuum/mopping robot at a more affordable price point.

The Q7 M5+ also comes with a self-emptying dock that keeps the robot as low-maintenance as possible. Unlike cheaper robot vacuums that need frequent emptying, the Q7 M5+ can clean unattended for up to 7 weeks so you can focus on what matters while still coming back to a clean and allergen-free home.

Roborock Q10 S5+: Upgraded Performance for Demanding Homes

Roborock Q10 S5+

A step up from the Q7 M5+, this cost-effective model adds Reactive Tech obstacle avoidance and the VibraRise 2.0 Mopping System while keeping the same strong suction and anti-tangle technology. It not only navigates your home with precision but also avoids objects in its cleaning path, so you don't have to tidy up as much before it cleans.

One standout feature of the Roborock Q10 S5+ is its VibraRise 2.0 Mopping System, which scrubs your floors 3,000 times per minute to tackle stubborn stains like dried coffee spills. It also automatically lifts the mop pad 8mm when it detects carpets, meaning you don't have to manually remove the pad if you have both hardwood and carpeted floors.

Like the Q7 M5+, the Q10 S5+ also comes with an auto-emptying dock that automatically cleans its dustbin when docked. It also has a bigger battery for extended cleaning rounds and can keep detailed maps for up to four floors, making it ideal for large and busy households that need thorough, hands-off cleaning.

Qrevo Series: Premium Features, Mid-Range Price

The Roborock Qrevo series hits the sweet spot between price and features for those seeking a truly hands-off floor-cleaning experience. Perfect for busy households, these models come with an all-in-one dock that auto-empties the dustbin, washes and dries the mop pads, and refills the water tank, offering a true set-and-forget smart cleaning solution.

In this new lineup, Roborock is introducing two models: the Qrevo S5V, featuring powerful 12,000Pa suction and warm air drying and offering superior functionality, and the QV 35A, which brings automated mopping and vacuuming for under $400 this Prime Day, perfect for those looking for an entry-level robot.

Roborock QV 35A: All-in-One Cleaning Under $400

Roborock QV 35A

For budget-conscious buyers who still want a low-maintenance robot vacuum and mop, the Roborock QV 35A delivers full functionality for under $400 this Prime Day. It features 8,000Pa HyperForce suction that effectively lifts dust, debris, and pet hair from hardwood floors and low-pile carpets, but the real surprise is the premium features packed into this affordable package.

The QV 35A includes a multifunctional dock that auto-empties the dustbin, washes and dries mop pads, and refills the water tank. While it lacks the warm air drying of the Qrevo S5V, that isn't a dealbreaker considering the price.

Like other models in the Qrevo series, the QV 35A features smart navigation with object avoidance and multi-room mapping. It also comes with anti-tangle brushes and dual-spinning mops that lift 10mm over carpets, so you can schedule it to vacuum and mop without worrying about damp carpets or missed spots when you get home.

Roborock Qrevo S5V: Best-in-Class Value

Roborock Qrevo S5V

The most value-packed option in the Qrevo lineup, the Roborock Qrevo S5V features impressive 12,000Pa suction that easily lifts dirt and pet hair embedded deep in crevices and carpets, plus a new FlexiArm edge mopping system that reaches into corners with ease. Combined with its highly effective anti-tangle brushes, the Qrevo S5V is an excellent choice for busy pet owners.

The Qrevo S5V comes equipped with dual spinning pads that lift 10mm over carpets to avoid wetting them. It can even extend the mop pads to scrub hard-to-reach edges and corners, leaving your floors spotless with every run.

While the powerful vacuum and mopping already set the Qrevo S5V apart from the competition, the included multifunctional dock takes it to another level.

In addition to automatically emptying the dustbin, the all-in-one dock also washes the mop pads, dries them with warm air, and refills the water tanks for the next cleaning cycle. That’s about as low-maintenance as a robot vacuum gets, especially at this price point.

Save Big on Roborock Robot Vacuums This Prime Day

This Prime Day, Roborock will be running huge sales on its new robot vacuums and mops starting from July 7, 2025. All four models will be on sale with heavy discounts of up to $800 at Amazon and Target, making this the best time to replace your traditional vacuum with a smart and fully automated cleaning solution.
